question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions. During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
… if you attend school, has your school building been closed?
If your school building has NOT been closed:
Are classes in session ?
Are you atteding classes in-person?
If your school building has BEEN CLOSED...
Have classes resumed online?
Do you have easy access to the internet and a computer?
Are there assignments for you to complete?
Are you able to receive meals from the school?
During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
… if you had a job prior to Coronavirus/COVID-19, are you still working?
If you had a job prior to Coronavirus/COVID-19, and you are STILL WORKING...
Are you still going to your workplace?
Are you teleworking or working from home?
If you had a job prior to Coronavirus/COVID-19, but you are NOT WORKING...
Were you laid off from your job?
Do you lose your job?
During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
… how many people, from outside of your household, have you had an in-person conversation with?
… how much time have you spent going outside of the home (e.g., going to stores, parks, etc.)?
option_text: Not at all, 1-2 days per week, A few days per week, Several days per week, Every day

question_text: … how stressful have the restrictions on leaving home been for you?
option_text: Not at all, Slighlty, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: … have your contacts with people outside of your home changed relative to before the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area?
option_text: A lot less, A little less, About the same, A little more, A lot more

question_text: … how much difficulty have you had following the recommendations for keeping away from close contact with people?
option_text: None, A little, Moderate, A lot , A great amount

question_text: … has the quality of the relationships between you and members of your family changed?
option_text: A lot worse, A little worse, About the same, A little better, A lot better

question_text: … how stressful have these changes in family contacts been for you?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
… has the quality of your relationships with your friends changed?

question_text: … how stressful have these changes in social contacts been for you?

question_text: … how much has cancellation of important events (such as graduation, prom, vacation, etc.) in your life been difficult for you?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: … to what degree have changes related to the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area created financial problems for you or your family?

question_text: … did you worry whether your food would run out because of a lack of money?
